channel.title: Disassembler on Алексей Пахунов
channel.description: Recent content in Disassembler on Алексей Пахунов

item.title: diStorm64 disassembler
item.description: Наткнулся на хороший open source disassembler, понимающий и 80x86 и amd64, и распространяемый под BSD лицензией: diStorm64. diStorm is a binary stream disassembler. It’s capable of disassembling 80x86 instructions in 64 bits (AMD64, X86-64) and both in 16 and 32 bits. In addition, it disassembles FPU, MMX, SSE, SSE2, SSE3, SSSE3, SSE4, 3DNow! (w/ extensions), new x86-64 instruction sets, VMX, and AMD’s SVM! diStorm was written to decode quickly every instruction as accurately as possible.
